cleaned_text: founded in 2006 and offers traditional Ayurvedic education and wellness services based on authentic Vedic principles. At our flagship Academy and Wellness Center in Milpitas, CA, we host in-class programs, many of which are live streamed to students across the globe. It's our commitment to bring academic excellence to Ayurvedic practices and to serve as a leading source of authentic Ayurvedic education, research, and community health care. [What is Ayurveda?](https://www.keralaayurveda.us/courses/about/what-is-ayurveda/) Ayurveda, or Traditional Indian Medicine has existed for over 5,000 years. Interest in Ayurveda is accelerating, and its health solutions are more relevant today than ever. [Read more >](https://www.keralaayurveda.us/courses/about/what-is-ayurveda/) [Our Mission](https://www.keralaayurveda.us/courses/about/mission/) Kerala Ayurveda USA is one of the largest Ayurvedic communities in the U.S. and growing each year. Our Academy is dedicated to preserving and sharing traditional Vedic knowledge as documented in the ancient texts. Supported by our deep roots in India, our global mission for community health care is made possible thanks to health seekers like you. [Read more >](https://www.keralaayurveda.us/courses/about/mission/) [Our Heritage](https://www.keralaayurveda.us/courses/about/heritage/) Kerala Ayurveda USA opened its doors ten years ago, though our lineage is much older. Discover what makes us one of the most authentic resources of traditional Ayurveda in the U.S. and beyond. [Read more >](https://www.keralaayurveda.us/courses/about/heritage/) [Faculty](https://www.keralaayurveda.us/courses/about/faculty/) Kerala Ayurveda Academy is proud to host a highly experienced team of clinicians and educators with a variety of experiencing practicing Ayurveda in the U.S. as well as India. [Meet our faculty >](https://www.keralaayurveda.us/courses/about/faculty/) [Our Team](https://www.keralaayurveda.us/courses/about/team/) Kerala Ayurveda Academy draws upon the deep commitment of our passionate U.S. team members, all life-long Ayurvedic students and healers who embrace our philosophy of compassionate care. [Meet us >](https://www.keralaayurveda.us/courses/about/team/) [Testimonials](https://www.keralaayurveda.us/courses/about/testimonials/) Our students are from all walks of life, but they have one thing in common: a passion for Ayurveda. Hear from our students about their experience studying with Kerala Ayurveda Academy.
